title: Lakers Lose Again, But Philly Looks Good
description:
Jalen & Jacoby need a moment to talk about LeBron and the Lakers. He vowed to stay with the team as long as he's playing, and they lost to the Pelicans. Plus, Kyrie Irving shot down the defending champs, Luka and the Mavs low-key look better since the deadline, and Philly's new Harden-filled lineup was dominant against the Knicks. All that plus a potential overtime change in the NFL and a deep dive into Jalen's blackjack mentality. Who splits Kings?!? Jalen does. And he'll tell you why. Double down with us! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
